text:
★★★★★ 5/5
Had an amazing dining experience at Istanbul Grill’s & Cafe!
We came in with no expectations and left absolutely satisfied.

The food was rich in flavour, well-seasoned, and beautifully presented.

The ambiance was cozy, service was warm, and the overall vibe made us feel right at home. A perfect spot whether you’re dining with friends or family.

Even though the prices are on the higher end, the quality of the food and ingredients really shines throug

The food was okay, nothing special at all. The sauce they put in doesn’t complement well especially the red sauce that looks and tasted like a salsa which is weird because it’s supposed to be a Turkish dish not Mexican. Definitely not authentic shawarma! The baklava is decent.
Service was quite confusing in a way that you don’t know who is really the server.
Not the best place to go if looking for good shawarma and pricing is also ex considering the food and service they serve.

I recently had the pleasure of dining at your restaurant, and I must say, I was very impressed. The food was delicious well-prepared  and full of flavor. The service was excellent   the staff were friendly, attentive, and professional. The atmosphere was clean, comfortable, and welcoming I truly enjoyed my experience and will definitely be coming back. Thank you for the great service!

Istanbul Grill’s is more than just your typical grill spot — it’s a flavorful journey. The seasoning in every dish really stands out, elevating the experience beyond the norm. The food was excellent, especially the Lamb Pide, Testi Kebab, and Sigara Boregi — each dish rich in taste and cooked to perfection.

The ambience was warm and welcoming, with ample space that makes it ideal for larger groups or gatherings. Whether you’re out with friends or planning a small celebration, the setting fits just right.

Overall, Istanbul Grill’s delivers on all fronts — delicious food, great atmosphere, and solid service. Definitely worth a visit!

We had an amazing experience at this Turkish restaurant! The hospitality was incredible, and the staff made us feel so welcome. The food was absolutely delicious, with flavors that truly stood out. The portions were huge, and we finally had a proper meal for the first time in the past two weeks. Thank you so much, Yasin, for making our visit unforgettable! We’ll definitely come back!
